text: phir jab vah usake saath daud-dhoop karane kee avastha ko pahuncha to usane kaha, "ai mere priy bete! main svapn mein dekhata hoon ki tujhe qurabaan kar raha hoon. to ab dekh, tera kya vichaar hai?" usane kaha, "ai mere baap! jo kuchh aapako aadesh diya ja raha hai use kar daalie. allaah ne chaaha to aap mujhe dhairyavaan paenge.
